text: Karen Percy is (born October 10, 1966) in Banff, Alberta is a Canadian Olympic skier. She had her Olympic debut in 1988. She was in Canadaâ€™s Sports Hall of Fame in the year 1994.We went to be on the Canadian Olympic Hall of Fame the next year. She also became a member of the Order of Canada in 1988. In 2005, she got into the Banff Sports Hall of Fame. == Other websites == Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Canada Category:Sportspeople from Alberta
